SEARCH
Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math

Interface Vector2

All Known Subinterfaces:
Vector3
All Known Implementing Classes:
Vector2.Value, Vector3.Observable, Vector3.ReadOnly, Vector3.Value
public interface Vector2
A head at some point in 2 dimensions and tail at (0, 0).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    Vector2.Value
    Basic mutable value-based Vector2 implementation.
